dataMapping.title: Channel Mix Performance Metrics
dataMapping.subtitle: Reach, frequency, and efficiency analysis across channels

metrics.primaryLabel: Channel performance category (e.g., 'Reach & Frequency', 'Efficiency Metrics', 'Cross-Channel Synergies')
metrics.secondaryLabel: Category description (e.g., 'Channel reach optimization and frequency management')

items.primaryLabel: Specific channel metric (e.g., 'Total Reach', 'Effective Frequency', 'Channel Efficiency')
items.isPrimary: Boolean - highlight as primary channel metric
insights: Channel mix insights and optimization opportunities
risks: Channel performance risks and market factors
